lead_paragraph: YABLON--Leonard. We are profoundly saddened by the passing of our good friend Lenny. A true gentleman, always caring and thoughtful, with an incredible capacity to think deeply. Warm and wonderful friend to all, with a great sense of humor. Our thoughts and prayers are with Pam and the Yablon extended family. Earle Altman, Gregg Schenker, Peter Burack, Steven Hornstock, Jason Fein and the ABS Partners Team 1/3
